projects.title: SkillForge AI
projects.description: AI-powered LMS platform offering mock interviews, PDF generation, and Interview questions with notes using React, Firebase, Clerk, and Shadcn.

projects.title: CricTrack
projects.description: SRH fan app for live scores and news updates built with React, Tailwind, and Clerk for a fast, fan-focused experience.

projects.title: Truth Lens
projects.description: Fake news detection system using Python and ML models like Naive Bayes, Random Forest, and Transformers in real time.

projects.title: Patreon Pioneers
projects.description: Platform for content creators to earn support from fans, built with Next.js to facilitate creator-audience transactions.

projects.title: Password Manager
projects.description: Secure full-stack app to manage and store passwords using React, Express.js, Tailwind CSS, and MongoDB backend.

projects.title: CricLaws
projects.description: RAG-based app trained on MCC laws to answer cricket law queries using Streamlit, Langchain, Faiss, and Sentence Transformers.

projects.title: Meme Store
projects.description: Template hub for memers built using Next.js and Supabase with fast search and sorting for improved meme creation flow.

projects.title: Mystery Message
projects.description: Next.js + TypeScript app that creates unique links to receive anonymous messages from friends in a fun, social format.

projects.title: Quizify
projects.description: Built a Basic Quiz application using React js and Typescript which allows users to play quiz with an interactive dashboard
